title: Disconnect, Forced to repatch, cannot reconnect.
body: Wait for it, Leaverbuster will strike becuase its somehow my fault that your software forcibly removes players.

replies.body: This is a pretty clear sign that your network is having problems reaching our server, *typically* due to a bad route your ISP is taking. Your network lost connection to the game, which it then noticed that you needed to update some corrupted or missing game files. Double check your network with our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but make sure you do the steps on **Port Forwarding and DNS settings** to tell your network to send your connection along a different route to our servers.
